sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with duo shui 多睡 , profuse sleeping. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 175: 治小兒宿食不 消，體熱多眠，嘔噦氣上，消谷丸方 , “To cure children whose food remains in their body over night without being digested, whose body is hot with profuse sleeping , and who vomit with rising qi, [use] the recipe for the ‘pills to digest grain’”.
② Pathological Condition of a disease with profuse sleeping.. Shang han lei zheng huo ren shu 傷寒類證活人書 85: 多眠有四證 , “[The disease of] profuse sleeping manifests itself in four conditions”.
